modName: zzz---Upgrade Legendary Weapon to Kill 99 percent of Enemy i
summary: Upgrade Legendary Weapon to Kill 99 percentage of Enemy in 1 Shot
descriptionHtml:
Upgrade Legendary Weapon to Kill 99 percentage of Enemy in 1 Shot

Go to Riverwood, Use the Grindstone and Workbench to upgrade your weapon and armor which is outside Alvor\'s home!

Attention: You should wear the armor and weapon before you upgrade it!

Just for Fun!!!

This Cheating contains \"The Best Cheating Combo\"
Which will function:
Skills - All Full
Perks - All Full
Health, Magicka, Stamina - 9999
Carryweight - 30,000
$$$ - 888888
All shouts with drogon souls to unlock
Shouts CD = 0 sec
With useful Spell Tomes and Extreme Weapons and Apparels!

How To Use:
Unzip and Copy it into your Skyrim folder.

That would be c:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim
or C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

While in game use \"~\" key which is left of 1 (on german keyboards \"^\")
to open the console and type

bat 02

Enjoy the game!

Warning: it will label your character as a cheater and disqualify it from Steam achievements.
